Episodes.Title: Jeremy at JLB
Episodes.Writer: Andrew O'Connor, Jesse Armstrong, Sam Bain
Episodes.Actors: David Mitchell, Robert Webb, Olivia Colman
Episodes.Plot: Jeremy starts working at JLB Credit, however the entire UK division of the company gets shut down by the German head office the same day. Mark forms a group to protest against the firings but really wants to impress Dobby.

Episodes.Title: The Test
Episodes.Writer: Andrew O'Connor, Jesse Armstrong, Sam Bain
Episodes.Actors: David Mitchell, Robert Webb, Olivia Colman
Episodes.Plot: Jeremy starts getting to know gorgeous new neighbour Elena and Mark invites Dobby round to the flat one evening. But they are about to find out who the father of Sophie's baby really is.

Episodes.Title: Jeremy in Love
Episodes.Writer: Andrew O'Connor, Jesse Armstrong, Sam Bain
Episodes.Actors: David Mitchell, Robert Webb, Olivia Colman
Episodes.Plot: Jeremy thinks he has fallen in love with Elena and tries to win her heart. Mark tries to get a job as a guide for London history walks.

Episodes.Title: The Affair
Episodes.Writer: Andrew O'Connor, Jesse Armstrong, Sam Bain
Episodes.Actors: David Mitchell, Robert Webb, Emily Bruni
Episodes.Plot: Jeremy finds out that Elena is already in a relationship, but with a woman. This turns him on and he continues seeing her. Johnson invites Mark to join his new management consultancy firm, but Mark starts to question his faith in ...

Episodes.Title: The Party
Episodes.Writer: Andrew O'Connor, Jesse Armstrong, Sam Bain
Episodes.Actors: David Mitchell, Robert Webb, Eliza L. Bennett
Episodes.Plot: Mark invites Dobby to a party at his flat, then has to work out how he'll actually organise it. Meanwhile things have gotten a bit frosty between Jez and Elena but he reckons he knows to handle it so she'll come running back to him.

Episodes.Title: Das Boot
Episodes.Writer: Andrew O'Connor, Jesse Armstrong, Sam Bain
Episodes.Actors: David Mitchell, Robert Webb, Emily Bruni
